Your Contribution Helps:

  • Develop new features that you request.

  • Fix bugs and issues the community reports here.

  • Show appreciation for the contributors and volunteers who keep the project going.

  • Spread the word about the project.

  • Sponsor community events that support the Open Source projects you love.
